messages.message: Hey all, just want to surface some documentation improvements. A list and brief description of all our services can be found here (https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/services/overview/). There’s also a comprehensive list of every environment variable across all services here (https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/services/env-docs-svc/). (there are ~500 of them so not made for light reading). The list is scrapped from our generated deployment jinja’s, and pre-merge checks will help guarantee that these stay up-to-date.

If you need a quicker way to look up service network policies, you can look up the env var for the host/port and take the auto-generated list. For example to find all services that need to talk to file-service, check here: https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/services/env-docs-svc/#tservice_file_host. To find all egress from file-service, check the host/ports from the list here https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/services/env-docs-svc/#file-tservice fyi the natwest and jpmc folks @Aimé @Matt Weaver @Aakash Tewari @raghu
Thank you @Heymian for all the work that went into this!!!
This is awesome! Thanks @Heymian! (any chance we can add the ports for each service as well, in the list? not urgent) or is that just noise

Thank you @Heymian!
@Naveen lets add  info for nb-reaper, and dynamic proxy here and remove server-nginx-nb https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/services/overview/
Sure, i can take a look at documenting port numbers. I’ll play around and see where the best place it can go.
